plan_context.query: Write a short note on how fast quantum computers currently are. It should be one paragraph and in the style of lecture notes.and write it onto a notion page called quantum

steps.task: Compose a short note on how fast quantum computers currently are in the style of lecture notes, ensuring the note is written as one paragraph. The note should include information describing the performance characteristics of quantum computers and their advantages over classical systems. Then, add the note onto a Notion page named 'quantum'.
